scripts.prepare-generate: node build/generate-contributors.js && node build/generate-contributor-avatar.js && node build/generate-nav.js
scripts.build:gh: npm run prepare-generate && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider NUXT_ENV_DEPLOY=gh nuxt generate
scripts.build:local: npm run prepare-generate && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider NUXT_ENV_DEPLOY=local nuxt generate
scripts.build:localsite: npm run prepare-generate && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider NUXT_ENV_DEPLOY=localsite nuxt generate
scripts.build:asf: npm run prepare-generate && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider NUXT_ENV_DEPLOY=asf nuxt generate
